resources.string:
This module can be used to login to this site using Twitter credentials.

To make it work, create Twitter app and specify all the details, particularly:

  • Callback URL: {0}
When the app is created make sure to specify the following fields:
  • Settings > Privacy Policy URL
  • Settings > Terms of Service URL
  • Settings > Enable "Allow this application to be used to Sign in with Twitter"
  • Permissions > Access > Read only
  • Permissions > Additional Permissions > Enable "Request email addresses from users"
Then enter generated API Key & Secret pair in this module settings.
Please configure the module in admin panel (can't define API key, secret & URL)
